# pdfreader
PDF reader using PDFBox.

```
java -classpath pdfreader.jar TextDrawExtractor <pdf | directory>
```

## TextDrawExtractor
Extract texts from PDF.
1. Id
1. Character or draw operator
1. Page number
1. Misc...

Example:
```
1   [MOVE_TO]	1   575.9997	210.439
2   [LINE_TO]	1   199.9998	210.439
3   [LINE_TO]	1   199.9998	210.939
4   [LINE_TO]	1   575.9997	210.939
5   [FILL_PATH] 1
6   [MOVE_TO]	1   206.1354	509.0457
7   [LINE_TO]	1   274.9039	509.0457
8   [CLOSE_PATH]    1
9   [FILL_PATH] 1
10  R	1   200.0125	101.367004	5.743927	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
11  E	1   205.71643	101.367004	5.3279266	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
12  S	1   211.00436	101.367004	5.3279266	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
13  E	1   216.2923	101.367004	5.3279266	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
14  A	1   221.58023	101.367004	5.3279266	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
15  R	1   226.77136	101.367004	5.743927	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
16  C	1   232.47528	101.367004	5.7439423	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
17  H	1   238.17921	101.367004	5.743927	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
18  A	1   245.64952	101.367004	5.327942	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
19  R	1   250.93745	101.367004	5.7439423	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
20  T	1   256.6414	101.367004	4.9119263	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
21  I	1   261.51334	101.367004	2.2479553	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
22  C	1   263.7213	101.367004	5.7438965	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
23  L	1   269.42523	101.367004	4.4159546	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
24  E	1   273.71237	101.367004	5.327942	3.5999548	Helvetica	1.0	2.247972
```

## ImageExtractor
Extract images from PDF.
1. Page number
1. x
1. y
1. width
1. height

Example:
```
3	106.02108	594.7168	94.08959	105.8508
3	254.82501	594.7168	93.23424	136.21608
3	402.77362	594.7168	100.5048	136.21608
4	147.50803	613.83466	93.875755	85.535995
4	253.21825	613.83466	105.636955	84.4668
4	370.68967	613.83466	105.636955	84.4668
6	313.12714	424.67242	236.412	141.8472
```
